dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Property Manager
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
property_manager
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
We need camera access to scan credit cards for payments, take photos of properties, document maintenance issues, and scan documents like leases and IDs.
We need photo library access to upload property images, maintenance photos, and document scans. This helps us maintain accurate property records and handle maintenance requests efficiently.
We need microphone access for voice notes about properties, maintenance issues, and tenant communications. This helps us provide better service and maintain detailed records.
We need location access to show nearby properties, calculate distances for maintenance visits, and provide location-based services like finding the nearest available property.
We need background location access to track maintenance staff visits, monitor property security, and provide real-time updates about property-related activities.
We need calendar access to schedule property viewings, maintenance appointments, and track important dates like lease renewals and rent payments.
We need contacts access to manage tenant information, maintenance staff contacts, and property owner details for efficient communication.
We use Face ID to securely access your account and protect sensitive property and payment information.
LaunchScreen
Main
TLSv1.2
We need media library access to play audio guides for property tours and maintenance instructions.
We use motion data to detect when you're walking through a property for virtual tours and to enhance the augmented reality features.
We use speech recognition to enable voice commands for property searches and to transcribe voice notes about properties.
We use Siri to enable voice commands for checking property status, scheduling viewings, and managing maintenance requests.
